conversion_verification.notes: The 2D floor plan has been successfully translated into a clean isometric 3D cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth, consistent wall thickness, and clear isometric perspective with no distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configuration and wall positions are nearly perfect. Excellent window and door placement matching the source plan.

interior_elements.notes: High fidelity in furniture mapping, including specific kitchen appliances, bathroom fixtures, and office furniture.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; materials and lighting make the layout easy to read. Background is neutral and professional.

detected_errors.description: Minor door swing direction differences in some rooms, though openings are correctly placed.

summary: This is a highly accurate and professional 3D conversion that faithfully adheres to every architectural detail of the source floor plan.
